Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.model.player

Class ClientPlayer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.model.player.ClientPlayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ClientPlayer extends Object implements Serializable
Representation of the player in the client's side.

      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player.
      starterCard - the starter card of the player.
      playerCards - the player's hand.
      objectiveCards - the objective cards to choose from.
